snippet: A study of cancer patients in Washington State has found they were twice as likely to file for bankruptcy as people without cancer.
abstract: Study of cancer patients in Washington State finds they are twice as likely to file for bankruptcy as people without cancer.
lead_paragraph: A study of cancer patients in Washington State has found they were twice as likely to file for bankruptcy as people without cancer.

headline.main: Washington: Cancer Patients More Prone to Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Washington: Cancer Patients More Prone To Bankruptcy
